title: Giusi Tamburello, “Concepts and Categories of Emotion in East Asia” (Carocci editore, 2012)
description:
What is the relationship between language and the emotions? Where ought we look for evidence of emotion in historical and literary texts? Is it possible to talk about the emotional states of entire cultures or groups of peoples, and if so, how should that level be reconciled with that of...
